short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays common numbers and sends notifications for daily updates

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Shillong Teer Common Number is a handy weapon for Teer lovers. This extension gives the user a daily update on the common number, house number, and ending number to help the user with the Shillong Teer. If you are curious to know how this tool functions, this tool scans teer result data of the last five years and it has the feature to detect most repeated patterns and trends. This historical approach may improve in entering house and ending numbers and provide users with a competitive advantage in there.
Features	
Common Number	-	Updated daily; based on trend analysis
House Number	-	Refreshed with historical data patterns
Ending Number	-	Derived from 5-year repeated numbers
Being a trend-based system that has incorporated automation into the mix, it is a must-have tool for players who need a shortcut in analysing Shillong Teer result.
